job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field

jd: From: Shivam, vkoresolutions shivam@vkoresolutions.com Reply to: shivam@vkoresolutions.com Job Title: Dot Net DeveloperLocation: Aurora Colorado ( Only Local or Nearby ) Experience: 8+ Years (W2) Visa: OPT/ H1B only Key Responsibilities:• Develop and maintain applications using .NET (C#, ASP.NET).• Collaborate with team members to understand project needs.• Write clean and efficient code.• Troubleshoot and fix software issues.• Optimize applications for better performance.• Stay updated on new technologies.Qualifications:• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.• Experience with .NET (C#, ASP.NET).• Basic knowledge of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).• Familiarity with databases (SQL Server, MySQL).• Good problem-solving skills.• Strong communication and teamwork skills. Thanks,Shivam SharmaVkoresolutions LLC shivam@vkoresolutions.com
